name: RiskyRiding (reupload)
description:
This is a re-upload of the Risky Riding game I made for the GMTK game jam 2020. I fluffed it a bit because I didn't include a UnityPlayer.dll file (first time developer), and I couldn't change it because the jam is still in progress. It is identical to the original upload.

Original - https://squidmasteriii.itch.io/risky-riding
